movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption

movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.title: The Godfather

movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, Batman must accept one of the greatest psychological and physical tests.
movies.title: The Dark Knight

movies.description: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
movies.title: 12 Angry Men

movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce.
movies.title: Schindler's List

movies.description: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom.
movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.title: Pulp Fiction

movies.description: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold.
movies.title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club.
movies.title: Fight Club

movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man.
movies.title: Forrest Gump

movies.description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given the inverse task of planting an idea.
movies.title: Inception

movies.description: While Frodo and Sam edge closer to Mordor with the help of Gollum, the divided fellowship makes a stand against Sauron's new ally.
movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers

movies.description: A meek Hobbit from the Shire and eight companions set out on a journey to destroy the powerful One Ring.
movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

movies.description: After the Rebels are overpowered by the Empire, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda.
movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back

movies.description: When a beautiful stranger leads computer hacker Neo to a forbidding underworld, he discovers the shocking truth.
movies.title: The Matrix

movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill.
movies.title: Goodfellas

movies.description: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rallies up the scared patients.
movies.title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

movies.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his motives.
movies.title: Se7en

movies.description: A poor village under attack by bandits recruits seven unemployed samurai to help them defend themselves.
movies.title: Seven Samurai

movies.description: When an open-minded Jewish librarian and his son become victims of the Holocaust, he uses humor to protect his son.
movies.title: Life Is Beautiful

movies.description: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer.
movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs

movies.description: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper.
movies.title: Saving Private Ryan

movies.description: In the slums of Rio, two kids' paths diverge as one struggles to become a photographer and the other a kingpin.
movies.title: City of God

movies.description: During her family's move to the suburbs, a sullen 10-year-old girl wanders into a world ruled by gods and witches.
movies.title: Spirited Away

movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movies.title: Interstellar

movies.description: A cynical expatriate American cafe owner struggles to decide whether or not to help his former lover escape.
movies.title: Casablanca

movies.description: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape.
movies.title: The Green Mile

movies.description: 12-year-old Mathilda is reluctantly taken in by LÃ©on, a professional assassin, after her family is murdered.
movies.title: Leon: The Professional

movies.description: A sole survivor tells of the twisty events leading up to a horrific gun battle on a boat.
movies.title: The Usual Suspects

movies.description: An aging samurai arrives at the home of his feudal lord, requesting an honorable place to commit suicide.
movies.title: Harakiri

movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.
movies.title: The Lion King

movies.description: Marty McFly, a 17-year-old high school student, is accidentally sent thirty years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean.
movies.title: Back to the Future

movies.description: A cyborg, identical to the one who failed to kill Sarah Connor, must now protect her teenage son John Connor from a more advanced cyborg.
movies.title: Terminator 2: Judgment Day

movies.description: A sexually frustrated suburban father has a mid-life crisis after becoming infatuated with his daughter's best friend.
movies.title: American Beauty

movies.description: A Phoenix secretary embezzles money from her employer's client, goes on the run and checks into a remote motel.
movies.title: Psycho

movies.description: The Tramp struggles to live in modern industrial society with the help of a young homeless woman.
movies.title: Modern Times

movies.description: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired to find the Ark of the Covenant before the Nazis.
movies.title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

movies.description: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
movies.title: Rear Window

movies.description: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance.
movies.title: Citizen Kane

movies.description: After a tragic accident, two stage magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.
movies.title: The Prestige

movies.description: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel.
movies.title: Apocalypse Now

movies.description: After a space merchant vessel receives an unknown transmission as a distress call, one of the crew is attacked by a mysterious life form.
movies.title: Alien

movies.description: A hack screenwriter writes a screenplay for a former silent film star who has faded into Hollywood obscurity.
movies.title: Sunset Boulevard

movies.description: An insane American general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
movies.title: Dr. Strangelove

movies.description: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
movies.title: The Great Dictator

movies.description: A man with short-term memory loss attempts to track down his wife's murderer.
movies.title: Memento

movies.description: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
movies.title: The Pianist

movies.description: An undercover cop and a police informant try to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.
movies.title: The Departed

movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
movies.title: Gladiator

movies.description: After the murder of his father, a young lion prince flees his kingdom only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.
movies.title: The Lion King

movies.description: Vincent Hanna, un lieutenant chevronné de la LAPD, s'efforce de coincer Neil McCauley et ses criminels alors qu'ils préparent un grand braquage de banque pour leur “retraite”. La frontière ténue entre le crime et la loi s'avère plus ambiguë que jamais tandis que les deux s'opposent mortellement.
movies.title: Heat

movies.description: Willow est un film américain réalisé par Ron Howard et sorti en 1988. Le film est produit par George Lucas et écrit par Bob Dolman (en) d'après une histoire de Lucas. Il raconte l'histoire d'un magicien amateur (Warwick Davis) qui fait équipe avec un guerrier (Val Kilmer) pour protéger un jeune bébé future princesse d'une reine tyrannique (Jean Marsh).
movies.title: Willow
